availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Commissary and Subsistence Department of the United States Army. Commissary-Generals: Brigadier General George Gibson, Brigadier General Joseph P. Taylor, and Brigadier General Amos B. Eaton.

ab.bibl: Bvt. Brig.-Gen. John W. Barriger, “The Army of the US Historical Sketches of Staff and Line with Portraits of Generals-in-Chief, The Subsistence Department,” The Army of the US Historical Sketches of Staff and Line with Portraits of Generals-in-Chief ed. Theophilus Francis Rodenbough and William L. Haskin (New York: Maynard, Merrill, & Co., 1896), 79-83.
